languages.text: "Его слова пропитаны серостью, сквозь которую прорываются всполохи медного отчаяния. Но грязно-болотного обмана... в них нет".

traits.locale_text: "Его слова пропитаны серостью, сквозь которую прорываются всполохи медного отчаяния. Но грязно-болотного обмана... в них нет".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "His words are soaked in grey, with flashes of copper desperation breaking through. But of the swampy muck of deceit... I see nothing."
languages.original_text: "Его слова пропитаны серостью, сквозь которую прорываются всполохи медного отчаяния. Но грязно-болотного обмана... в них нет".

traits.locale_text: "His words are soaked in grey, with flashes of copper desperation breaking through. But of the swampy muck of deceit... I see none."
"His words are soaked in grey, with flashes of copper desperation breaking through. But of the swampy muck of deceit... I see none."
"His words are soaked in grey, with flashes of copper desperation breaking through. But of the swampy muck of deceit... I see nothing."
"His words are soaked in grey, with flashes of copper desperation breaking through. But of the swampy muck of deceit... I see nothing."
"His words are soaked in grey, with flashes of copper desperation breaking through. But of the swampy muck of deceit... I see nothing."
"His words are soaked in grey, with flashes of copper desperation breaking through. But of the swampy muck of deceit... I see nothing."

languages.text: "Seine Worte sind in Grau getaucht, durchdrungen von Blitzen kupferfarbener Verzweiflung. Aber den schlammigen Sumpf des Betrugs ... sehe ich nicht."
languages.original_text: "His words are soaked in grey, with flashes of copper desperation breaking through. But of the swampy muck of deceit... I see nothing."

traits.locale_text: "Seine Worte sind in Grau getaucht, durchdrungen von Blitzen kupferfarbener Verzweiflung. Aber den schlammigen Sumpf des Betrugs ... sehe ich nicht."

languages.text: « Ses paroles sont teintées de gris, avec des reflets cuivrés de désespoir. Mais je ne perçois aucune trace... de la bourbe de la duplicité. »
languages.original_text: "His words are soaked in grey, with flashes of copper desperation breaking through. But of the swampy muck of deceit... I see nothing."

traits.locale_text: « Ses paroles sont teintées de gris, avec des reflets cuivrés de désespoir. Mais je ne perçois aucune trace... de la bourbe de la duplicité. »

languages.text: “他的话语浸透了灰色，闪烁着黄铜色的绝望，但……我没有看到泥沼般的谎言。”
languages.original_text: "His words are soaked in grey, with flashes of copper desperation breaking through. But of the swampy muck of deceit... I see nothing."

traits.locale_text: “他的话语浸透了灰色，闪烁着黄铜色的绝望，但……我没有看到泥沼般的谎言。”

languages.text: «Sus palabras están empapadas de gris, marcadas con destellos de desesperación cobriza. Pero del lodo fangoso del engaño... no veo nada».
languages.original_text: "His words are soaked in grey, with flashes of copper desperation breaking through. But of the swampy muck of deceit... I see nothing."

traits.locale_text: «Sus palabras están empapadas de gris, marcadas con destellos de desesperación cobriza. Pero del lodo fangoso del engaño... no veo nada».

languages.text: 「彼の言葉は灰色に染まり、ところどころに銅色の絶望が閃いています。ですが、欺瞞というぬかるんだ泥は…あたくしには見えません」
languages.original_text: "His words are soaked in grey, with flashes of copper desperation breaking through. But of the swampy muck of deceit... I see nothing."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の言葉は灰色に染まり、ところどころに銅色の絶望が閃いています。ですが、欺瞞というぬかるんだ泥は…あたくしには見えません」

languages.text: "Sözleri griye bulanmış, bakır rengi umutsuzluk parıltılarıyla dolu. Fakat aldatmacanın bataklık çamurundan hiçbir şey göremiyorum."
languages.original_text: "His words are soaked in grey, with flashes of copper desperation breaking through. But of the swampy muck of deceit... I see nothing."

traits.locale_text: Sözleri griye bulanmış, bakır rengi umutsuzluk parıltılarıyla dolu. Fakat aldatmacanın bataklık çamurundan hiçbir şey göremiyorum."
